short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The smartest way to organize your tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With URL Tab Organizer, you can effortlessly create and manage groups of tabs based on their URLs, providing you with a seamless and organized browsing environment.

URL Tab Organizer offers a user-friendly interface that seamlessly integrates into your browser, allowing you to easily group related tabs together for improved productivity and efficient navigation. Whether you're conducting research, planning a trip, or working on multiple projects, this extension empowers you to stay organized and focused.

Key features of URL Tab Organizer include:

1. Group Creation: Effortlessly create tab groups by simply selecting and assigning tabs based on their URLs. You can create as many groups as you need, ensuring a personalized and customizable browsing experience.

2. URL-Based Sorting: URL Tab Organizer automatically categorizes tabs into groups based on their shared URLs. This intelligent sorting feature saves you time and effort by automatically assigning tabs to their respective groups.

3. Customizable Group Labels: Personalize your tab groups by assigning custom labels to easily identify and differentiate between them.

4. Group Management: Easily add or remove tabs from existing groups, rename groups, and delete groups as needed. URL Tab Organizer gives you full control over your tab organization, enabling you to adapt and refine your browsing experience on the go.

Say goodbye to tab overload and welcome a more efficient and productive browsing experience with URL Tab Organizer.
